name: The Faulkner News
tag_list: local-news, faulkner-county-arkansas, conway-arkansas, vilonia-arkansas, mayflower-arkansas, greenbrier-arkansas
overview:
Citizen Driven news and events plus a public & private protocol business directory. The private protocol service is 100% permission based.

We are developing a private contact protocol for each business entity. There will be permission based queries for you to submit if you are a certified member. If the contact person grants permission, you will be notified. If they want to know more they establish approval to connect, you will be advised. The status if your request will always be displayed. Should they decline your approach, you will be notified.

Keep your approach brief and to the point as that is the best way to attain access. They will specify the parameters for the protocol they wish to use for your particular approach.

When they are looking for a provider or asking for an Request for Proposal (RFP), they will post that.
